entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 08:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon and ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
